version_description:
# New Features

## Post Screen

- You can now edit your posted pictures
- You can edit nowplaying's format
- Edit by going to settings -> edit #nowplaying

## Edit Profile Screen

- You can now edit your profile pictures

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed the bug in which photos attached to tweets become stretched out
- Fixed the problem where users cannot scroll up or down when there are 7 buttons on the tool bar of the posting screen
- Fixed the issue in which opening the posting screen from the Web would display the image without the applied theme on the completion list screen
- Fixed the problem where the mute function does not work for quote tweets in the tweet details screen
- Fixed the bug where the lower bar falls outside the screen when rotating the screen
- Fixed the issue where the hash tags were not being displayed in the trend tab
- Fixed the problem that made it difficult to use the seek bar in the media screen

# Other

- You can now set the trend position
- When inserting #nowplaying, you can now set whether to attach an artwork by default
- You can now reload video that has failed to load

Many thanks for your continuous use of Feather.

This update is regarding making the heavily requested movie post possible. Please take a look.

# New Features

## Post Screen

- It is now possible to post a video
- If there aren't any options to attach a video on the posting screen, then please go to Settings > Posting Screen Settings > Customize Tool Bar, and add it as necessary.
- A video filming function will be included in the next upgrade.

## Timeline

- Added a setting option to make the icons appear rounded.
- Added a setting option to display the number of retweets/likes on your timeline.
- Possible via: Timeline Settings > Tweet Layout.
- If you click and hold on the URL of an image or video for an extended period of time, it will open in another browser.

## Others

- Added Smooz as external browser option
- Now possible to clear ones internet cache

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed the bug that caused videos to fail during playback
- Fixed the bug that occurred when tweets were still unable to be seen on ones timeline despite clearing the block
- Fixed the bug that caused a tab name to be reverted back to its original name despite having changed it
- Fixed the bug that caused the layout to go weird when turning the screen to use the DM telephone screen.

- Fixed the bug that caused videos to fail during playback.
- Fixed the bug that occurred when tweets were still unable to be seen on ones timeline despite clearing the block.
- Fixed the bug that caused a tab name to be reverted back to its original name despite having changed it.
- Fixed the bug that caused the layout to go weird when turning the screen to use the DM telephone screen.

# Others

- Unified the capitalization for number of favorites
- Added the possibility of re-tweeting your own tweets, even if both accounts are run by the same user

We'd like to thank all of our users for the many reviews they have written for us.

The theme change feature which was previously only available to pro users, has been unlocked!

# New Features

## Timeline

- The counters for favorites and retweets can now be refreshed.
- Due to a technical limitation, it is not possible to update these numbers perfectly in real time.
- They will be updated when the detailed tweet view is opened, or when you like or retweet a tweet yourself.

## Post Screen

- A rotation tool has been added to the editor for image attachments.

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed the bug in which the screen would occasionally freeze when receiving notifications.
- Fixed the bug where URLs contained in DMs could not be opened in external browsers.
- Fixed the bug where the profile screen would be displayed incorrectly.

# Others

- The free version can now change themes too!

Sorry to keep all of you waiting! Here's the correspondence regarding the iPhone X display!

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed bug whereby muted users are deleted when you block a user
- Fixed bug whereby tabs cannot be rearranged properly in the page
- Fixed bug whereby users are unable to change the theme color

# Others

- Changed RT exclusion action when searching and increased the number of search results in Japanese
- Able to handle logins using the Twitter official app
- Able to write tweets up to 280 characters

Regarding Changes in Character Limits

You can now tweet up to 280 characters in Twitter with the exception of Japanese, Chinese and Korean.
We have made it possible to send out your tweet even though it exceeds the character limit.
Postings will fail if you exceed the character limit on Twitter however, so make sure to shorten your post before submitting again.
Display of the correct number of character count will be provided in future updates.

The next version will no longer supports iOS 9.3 . The next version will support iOS 10.3.

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug where retweet exclusion in search criteria yielded no response
- Fixed a bug where particular URLs would crash upon accessing
- Fixed a bug where large images appeared abnormal on iPhone X
- Fixed a bug with the automatic scrolling on iPhone X

# Other

- Added an English FAQThe next version will support iOS 10.3.

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug where retweet exclusion in search criteria yielded no response
- Fixed a bug where particular URLs would crash upon accessing
- Fixed a bug where large images appeared abnormal on iPhone X
- Fixed a bug with the automatic scrolling on iPhone X

# Other

- Added an English FAQ

---

Sorry to keep all of you waiting! Here's the correspondence regarding the iPhone X display!

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed bug whereby muted users are deleted when you block a user
- Fixed bug whereby tabs cannot be rearranged properly in the page
- Fixed bug whereby users are unable to change the theme color

# Others

- Changed RT exclusion action when searching and increased the number of search results in Japanese
- Able to handle logins using the Twitter official app
- Able to write tweets up to 280 characters

Regarding Changes in Character Limits

You can now tweet up to 280 characters in Twitter with the exception of Japanese, Chinese and Korean.
We have made it possible to send out your tweet even though it exceeds the character limit.
Postings will fail if you exceed the character limit on Twitter however, so make sure to shorten your post before submitting again.
Display of the correct number of character count will be provided in future updates.

# Fixed a crash bug.

This problem occurs at the time of communication, and at startup, timeline update,
It occurred in various scenes such as posting.
Most of the crash reported by everyone is considered to be caused by this problem.
If there is a case that the problem is not fixed even if you use this version, please take a moment to report it again.

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed bug that became easy to crash

# Others

- Supported 280 characters tweet

---

Sorry to keep all of you waiting! Here's the correspondence regarding the iPhone X display!

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed bug whereby muted users are deleted when you block a user
- Fixed bug whereby tabs cannot be rearranged properly in the page
- Fixed bug whereby users are unable to change the theme color
- Fixed a bug where retweet exclusion in search criteria yielded no response
- Fixed a bug where particular URLs would crash upon accessing
- Fixed a bug where large images appeared abnormal on iPhone X
- Fixed a bug with the automatic scrolling on iPhone X

# Others

- Changed RT exclusion action when searching and increased the number of search results in Japanese
- Able to handle logins using the Twitter official app
- Added an English FAQ

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed a bug where web pages failed to save to specific external apps such as Pocket.

# Others

Now you can copy the User Support ID needed to send a detailed bug report to User Support through "Settings -> Help -> Report an issue or submit a request".

We may ask you to send this ID when you're contacting User Support through replies.
The ID is automatically attached when contacting through email.

# Bug Fixes

- Fixed bug that images of Instagram were not displayed

## Others

- Corresponded to specification change of quoted tweet API

We changed the API of DM to a new one in the update this time around due to a specification change in Twitter.

The following restrictions will occur as a result of this change.

1. DMs can only be retrieved for the last 30 days
2. There will be a few minutes of lag time until the DM can be retrieved after it has been sent

Also, we have plans to remove the User Stream function in the next version that will be released as the API of User Stream will be terminated on August 16.

We apologize for the inconvenience caused, but these restrictions are implemented by Twitter and cannot be worked on.

We seek your kind understanding for this matter.

## Bug fixes

- Fixed double display of title in a navigation bar
- Fixed uncommon crashes when swiping through tweets

## Others

- Removed function to open favstar page
- Changed compatible iOS versions to iOS 10.3 and above

Twitter will shut down of the User Stream API on August 16th; this update is removing related features.

The following features that depended on User Stream can no longer be used.

- Real-time updating of the timeline (The home timeline can now only be updated 15 times per 15 minutes)
- Simple notifications
- Real-time notifications of likes, retweets, and DMs
- The feature allowing streaming without locking the screen
- The feature to always scroll to the latest tweet

We understand this is an inconvenience, but these changes are being made by Twitter. We have no choice.

Please understand.

## Others

- Added Black and Dream themes

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a problem that DM cannot be received if the user who sent the DM is deleted
- Fixed a bug that DM can get only 50 messages

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that might not be able to load Direct Message

# Others

- Improved visibility of Dream theme

We are sorry for the inconvenience.

Because of a bug in the draft loading in the previous (v3.11.3) version, a problem which makes drafts disappear has been happening.

We have fixed the issue in the current version, but because of Twitter overwriting the draft data when a new draft is saved or a post is uploaded, many people have irrecoverably lost their drafts.

Users who have an iTunes backup may be able to recover their drafts by restoring it and then updating feather.

Please accept our deepest apologies for the inconvenience which we have caused.

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that might not be able to load Direct Message

# Others

- Improved visibility of Dream theme

# Bug fixes

- Fixed bug that can not be acquired when there are many Direct Messages.

# Other

- The color of the star icon of the dream theme has been made friendly to see.

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that the tweet body was broken in the middle of a word.
Update internal library.
Updated API used to translate tweets.

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that crashes the app when translating tweets
- Fixed a bug that posting screen is not displayed correctly when tweeting web page
- Fixed a bug that high frame rate video can not be posted
- Fixed a rare crash in the timeline
- Fixed a bug that the theme is not reflected in the search option screen.
- Fixed a bug that tabs are shifted when rotating the screen.

# Other

To prevent the music from playing when the media screen is closed, the paused music is not played again.

# Bug fixes

- Fixed crash bug on iOS 12.1.
- Fixed a bug that could not be updated if the location, URL, etc. are empty in profile editing.
- Fixed a bug that album name could not be seen on photo selection screen when dark theme.
- Fixed a bug that the text color of the status bar becomes white when dark theme.
- Fixed an issue where it was difficult to see the settings screen when dark theme.

# New features

The scroll position is now retained after restarting the app.
This eliminates the need to re-scroll if the app crashes in the background!

# Bug fixes

-Don't lose posts even if the app crashes in the background
-Fixed a bug that NowPlaying may not work on the posting screen
-Fixed a bug that WebView opens when authenticating with Twitter app

#Other

-feather is no longer available on devices older than iOS 11.4; please update iOS

Fixed a bug that retweets were included in the trend timeline!

# New features

The scroll position is now retained after restarting the app.
This eliminates the need to re-scroll if the app crashes in the background!

# Bug fixes

-Don't lose posts even if the app crashes in the background
-Fixed a bug that NowPlaying may not work on the posting screen
-Fixed a bug that WebView opens when authenticating with Twitter app

#Other

-feather is no longer available on devices older than iOS 11.4; please update iOS

# New features

The list timeline can now be updated automatically!
You can turn it on and off by pressing and holding the tab!

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that "Read more tweets" appears too much in the timeline
- Fixed an issue where the app would quit in the background

#Other

- Added new theme
- Made overall design adjustments
- Added explanation of post button to tutorial
- The timeline icon is now rounded by default
- Can be changed from the setting screen

We apologize for the inconvenience.
We fixed a bug that caused a crash after posting a tweet.

# New features

The list timeline can now be updated automatically!
You can turn it on and off by pressing and holding the tab!

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that "Read more tweets" appears too much in the timeline
- Fixed an issue where the app would quit in the background

#Other

- Added new theme
- Made overall design adjustments
- Added explanation of post button to tutorial
- The timeline icon is now rounded by default
- Can be changed from the setting screen

# New features

- Added setting to hide tab names
- Added result type (latest/popular) to search options
- The trend screen can be opened from the search screen

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that countries could not be selected on the trend screen

# Other

- Changed to show in recent searches even when changing search options
- Added the number of tweets on the trend list screen
- Made it easier to see the display that reads tweets

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that the app crashes when deleting search history
- Fixed a bug that the position of the heart on the timeline is misaligned
- Fixed a bug that the profile screen display collapsed when changing the tweet layout setting

# Other

- Removed "All" from search results options
- Image size increased when the quality of posted images was high

# New features

We forgot to write it in the last release notes, but now you can set the background of the timeline!
You can set it from "Settings-> Timeline Settings-> Tweet Layout"!

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that the release notes after the update may not be displayed.

#Other

- Removed the limit on the number of tabs

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that Instagram images are not displayed.
- Fixed a bug where tweets were tweeted when the Tweet button was swiped down.

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that the background image of the timeline was not reflected
- We are currently investigating a problem that the background image of the reply tweet does not change.
- Fixed an animation bug when closing the media screen quickly
- Fixed a bug that could cause a crash when opening a new feature pop-up

# Other

- Design adjustment

# Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that the background image of the timeline could not be set.
- Fixed a bug that the timeline became heavy on some iPhones

# Introduction of useful features

You can close the screen by swiping down the toolbar on the post screen!
You no longer have to stretch your finger to the top of the screen!
